description:
An alien invasion was the most significant event in human history. With the dawn of the 21st century, people turn a hopeful glance towards the future. Humanity shall endure.
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: Every Time I Say Goodbye: Gun Parade March
Sayonara o Iu Tabi ni: Gun Parade March
À chaque fois que tu me dis au revoir...
さよならを言う度に - Gun Parade March -
잘 가를 말할 떄마다: Gun Parade March
